monologue.text: You enter into the bar nervously, scanning the room for Guide.
The bar is bustling, and the energy of Open Mic night is contagious, if not overwhelming.
[i]*This isn't good, look at all these people...*[/i]
[i]*I mean look at that guy with, what are those?! Wood swords and irezumi tattoo!*[/i]
[i]*If I slip up around that guy its curtains for me!*[/i]
Hey! Over here! There’s someone I’ve been wanting you to meet.
